archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Track and Monitor Logistics and Manage Resource Inventory
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Tracking and monitoring of the usage of, and access to, the specific process and associated costs of the specific processes, and reporting on the findings

properties.value: Managing the registration and access control processes that enable supplier and/or third party processes to create, modify, update, delete and/or download relevant details into inventory systems associated with any of the above processes;
